question: Which among the following defines web2.0 most precisely?
option2: A Series of technological improvements in World Wide Web
option3: A New labeling of old Softwares improved
answer: A Series of technological improvements in World Wide Web
explanation: It is the second stage of internet. Web 2.0 refers to websites that emphasize user-generated content, ease of use, participatory culture and interoperability (i.e., compatible with other products, systems, and devices) for end users.
